Description: Concave lip and wall sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup (type C); lip sharply offset inside and out, thickened at rim; wholly glazed, though abraded; inscription cut on the outside of lip.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 22.2.32)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1626)
